items.title: Apply Saved Appearance Mode on Startup
items.description: App now remembers last appearance mode (Dark, Light, System) on startup.

items.title: New toggle Fullscreen on Startup
items.description:
Toggle to open app on fullscreen or normal window. Saved in INI file.
Added Close button for fullscreen mode.

items.title: Advanced Configs Buttons
items.description: Changed ★ to ★ Starred and ☆ to ☆ Add to Starred

items.title: Tab Build Load Times Added for Troubleshooting
items.description:
The System Info button within this pop up now displays the time taken to build each tab on startup.
Help point to where imrpovements can be made.
